table.name: vtiger_change
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_change` ( `changeid` int(11) NOT NULL, `change_no` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `changename` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `changecategory` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `qty_per_unit` decimal(11,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `unit_price` decimal(25,2) DEFAULT NULL, `sales_start_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `sales_end_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `start_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `expiry_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `discontinued` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `change_usageunit` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `website` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `taxclass` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `currency_id` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `commissionrate` decimal(7,3) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`changeid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_change` FOREIGN KEY (`changeid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_crmentity` (`crmid`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_changecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_changecf` ( `changeid` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `c_old_task_ref` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', `c_new_task_ref` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', `c_start_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `c_end_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `c_task_budget` decimal(56,8) DEFAULT NULL, `c_hourly_charges` decimal(56,8) DEFAULT NULL, `c_task_budget_hours` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', `c_co_mode` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`changeid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
